description: This new release adds the support for Vertex Accounts, internal database, and more.
This new release adds the support for Vertex Accounts, internal database, and more.
WARNING: this version introduces breaking changes. Please proceed with a clean install. This release fixes various container volume issues.
This new version moves forward in the process of unifying the web components, while also adding many tests and refactoring the code.
This new version moves forward in the process of unifying the web components, while also adding many tests and refactoring the code.
This new version introduces an entirely new update process, increase the modularity of the source code, and fixes a wide range of issues.

This new version introduces a new flexible app system, and new ways to install relational databases with the new Vertex SQL app. The client is also more reliable and faster, and the server is more stable and secure.
